name: Terraform For Tallulah
description:
Terraform for Tallulah is a survival game where you must help Tallulah escape the fire!!!

It was solo created by myself in a 3 week timeframe as the first part of a Games Design MA. I was learning on the job, (no code knowledge before development started) and had no time to tweak the art style. 

That said, it's surprisingly fun and challenging! Enjoy!!!

Let me know in the comments if you would like this reworked and improved; I'm a lot more experienced now and if people like the game I can possibly find the time to improve it!
